author: Kendall Karson
title: More than half of Americans wear masks as coronavirus' new normal takes hold: POLL
description: More than half of Americans who went out in public in the last week say they've worn a face mask, according to a new ABC News/Ipsos poll.
content: More than half of Americans who went out in public in the last week say they've worn a face mask, as an overwhelming majority of Americans remain concerned over the reach of the novel coronavirus and less are optimistic about the fight against and ultimate im… [+6068 chars]
